names.english: unblock the pulse decoction for frigid extremities
names.commonEnglish: Unblock the Pulse Decoction for Frigid Extremities
aka: Licorice, Aconite and Ginger Pulse Combination
Decoction for Treating Vital Prostration with Cold Limbs by Invigorating the Vascular System

actions: Tonifies Qi, strengthens the Spleen and moderates the drying properties of the formula.
Warms Kidney, Spleen and Heart Yang, stimulates exhausted Yang, warms Ming Men Fire and the entire body by traveling through all twelve channels.
With Gan Jiang, strengthens Kidney and Spleen Yang.
With Gan Jiang and Zhi Gan Cao (large dose), for diarrhea with undigested food and cold extremities due to Collapse of Yang.
(Use only if the condition is critical.)
Warms the Middle Jiao and Lungs and rescues Yang.
With Zhi Gan Cao, detoxifies Fu Zi.

syndromes: Heart Yang Deficiency Exhaustion: Yin Flourishing Masked by Yang
Shao Yin Stage with Interior Cold and Exterior Heat

conditions.name: Superficial pulse in a weak conformation
